No this probably is a user error, because the op was placed on CPU: _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0".
If the GPU is configured properly and the op is placed correctly on GPUs by users, the op Conv2DCustomBackpropInputOp will not appear in the graph at all.

body:
No this probably is a user error, because the op was placed on CPU:  `_device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/device:CPU:0"`.
If the GPU is configured properly and the op is placed correctly on GPUs by users, the op `Conv2DCustomBackpropInputOp` will not appear in the graph at all.
